# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This unique item is worth $1500000 to you, and I believe it would significantly enhance your life or business. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $1200000. This offer reflects my desire to see the product go to someone who appreciates its true worth and will cherish it as much as I have. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of facilitating this transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
